TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CommandStage extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: The CommandStage enumeration represents the defined stages of execution for a series of TestCommands. The int values of the enum are used to apply decorators in the proper order. Lower values are applied first and are therefore "closer" to the actual test execution.
Docs.remarks: No CommandStage is defined for actual invocation of the test or for creation of the context. Execution may be imagined as proceeding from the bottom of the list upwards, with cleanup after the test running in the opposite order.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype NUnit.Framework.Internal.Commands.CommandStage AboveSetUpTearDown = int32(3)
.field public static literal valuetype NUnit.Framework.Internal.Commands.CommandStage BelowSetUpTearDown = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype NUnit.Framework.Internal.Commands.CommandStage CreateFixture = int32(6)

Docs.summary: Create the fixture object used for running the test and dispose of it afterwards. This stage is used internally by NUnit and should not normally appear in user-defined decorators.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype NUnit.Framework.Internal.Commands.CommandStage CreateThread = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Create any thread needed for execution of the test and destroy it afterwards

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype NUnit.Framework.Internal.Commands.CommandStage Default = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype NUnit.Framework.Internal.Commands.CommandStage PostSetUpPreTearDown = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Make adjustments needed before and after running the raw test - that is, after any SetUp has run and before TearDown.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype NUnit.Framework.Internal.Commands.CommandStage PreSetUpPostTearDown = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Make adjustments needed before and after running the entire test - including SetUp and TearDown.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype NUnit.Framework.Internal.Commands.CommandStage Repeat = int32(5)
.field public static literal valuetype NUnit.Framework.Internal.Commands.CommandStage SetContext = int32(7)

Docs.summary: Make changes to the context necessary for running the test. An example of use would be to change the CurrentCulture before the test and restore it afterwards.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype NUnit.Framework.Internal.Commands.CommandStage SetUpTearDown = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Run SetUp and TearDown for the test.
